function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor city planning and sanitation leading to rapid spread of plague and cholera","Impact":"High mortality rates and widespread disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Improved urban planning, sanitation systems, and public health measures","Technologies":"Sanitary facilities, modern city planning, quarantine measures","People":"Residents of poorly planned cities, travelers, traders","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Miasma theory leading to ineffective disease prevention measures","Impact":"Misallocation of resources, continued disease transmission","Mitigation":"Education on disease transmission, adoption of evidence-based disease prevention measures","Technologies":"Public health education, scientific research on disease transmission","People":"City planners, public health officials, residents","Owner":"Public health authorities, scientific community"},{"Description":"Misunderstanding of disease transmission routes leading to ineffective containment measures","Impact":"High mortality rates and continued disease transmission","Mitigation":"Research into disease transmission routes, implementation of evidence-based containment measures","Technologies":"Medical research on disease transmission, water sanitation systems","People":"Public health officials, researchers, residents","Owner":"Public health authorities, scientific community"}]}
